amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Help America Vote Act by $50 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in House Report 111-208 to reduce funding for the Help America Vote Act by $50 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Emerson amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 250 (Roll no. 556).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mrs. Emerson.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
